name: Double Punch Man
description:
Play Double Punch Man on Ludum Dare's Website and

please rate!

Ludum Dare 34: Two Button Controls

This is my LD34 entry, DoublePunch Man!

Use the Left and Right Arrow Keys to Punch,

Double-Tap an Arrow Key to Dodge in that Direction,

and hold down both Arrow Keys to Charge up a

massive Double Punch!
